author: freejobalert.com
title: SCTIMST Recruitment 2017 – Walk in for General Apprentice, Project Asst & Perfusionist Posts

organizations.name: achutha menon centre for health science studies of the institute at medical college campus
sree chitra tirunal institute for medical sciences & technology

text: Click here for Perfusionist Post Details SCTIMST Recruitment 2017 – Walk in for General Apprentice & Project Asst Posts: Sree Chitra Tirunal Institute for Medical Sciences & Technology (SCTIMST), Thiruvananthapuram has invited applications for the recruitment of General Apprentice & Project Assistant (Lab) vacancies for different projects.   walk in on 15-12-2016, 04-  & how   SCTIMST   11 + Panel Name of the Posts: 1. General Apprentice: 10 + Panel Posts 2. Project Assistant (Lab): 01 Post Age Limit: Candidates age limit should be 35 years as on 30-11-2016.   Degree for Post 1, B.Sc. MLT / B.Sc. + DMLT for Post 2.   written test/ interview. How to Apply: For Post 1:   appear for interview along with bio-data, original and copies of certificates to prove their age, qualification etc on 15-12-2016 at 10:30 a.m. at IV FLOOR~ Achutha Menon Centre for Health Science Studies of the Institute at Medical College Campus, Thiruvananthapuram. For Post 2:   appear for interview along with bio-data and original certificates to prove age, qualifications, experience etc on 04-01-2017 at 10:30 am at Biomedical Technology Wing, Satelmond Palace, Poojappura, Thiruvananthapuram-695 012. Important Dates: Date & Time of Interview for Post 1: 15-12-2016 at 10:30 a.m. Date & Time of Interview for Post 2: 04-01-2017 at 10:30 am Reporting Time: 09:00 a.m.
